arts.ttl: Ange Postecoglou Reacts to Clash With Furious Tottenham Fans
arts.sum: Tottenham manager Ange Postecoglou has addressed his confrontation with angry Spurs supporters following their 1-0 loss to Bournemouth.

arts.ttl: What Bournemouth players were saying about Ange Postecoglouâ€™s Tottenham after beating them
'I'm sorry': O'Hara calls for football to ban one thing Postecoglou keeps asking his players to do at Spurs
Spurs player ratings vs Bournemouth - Johnson, Maddison and Kulusevski dreadful
arts.sum: Postecoglou had former Cherries striker Dominic Solanke back from illness while Archie Gray was handed his first Premier League start to give Pedro Porro a rest and Dejan Kulusevski came back into the side after his rest against Fulham. Tottenham huffed and puffed but it was the hosts who had the better chances in the second half with Fraser Forster called into action on a number of occasions to send Spurs home with nothing.

arts.ttl: Every word Ange Postecoglou said on what happened in his altercation with Tottenham supporters
arts.sum: Like I said, we started the game well but football is a game where you try to control it and dictate it to play the way you want to but when you give goals away like we did tonight, and we have done that consistently not just with set-pieces but just in general this year, it just gives the opportunity then for the opposition, particularly a team like Bournemouth, to play on the counter which is what they want to do. When you are coming to a place like Bournemouth the one thing you do know is itâ€™s going to be a tough game with the conditions and the way they play, they sort of keep under control the whole time.

arts.ttl: Ange 'didn't like' what furious Spurs boo boys dished out during confrontation as ex star claims 'he will get sacked'
arts.sum: The former Celtic star is engulfed in a crisis as fed-up fans have lashed out at him following another setback

arts.sum: Ange Postecoglou saw his Tottenham team lose at Bournemouth on Thursday night and the Australian had to cop it from the away fans, who were keen to make their feelings clear

arts.ttl: Spurs' Postecoglou confronts angry fans after loss
arts.sum: Tottenham Hotspur manager Ange Postecoglou confronted fans after his side's tame 1-0 Premier League defeat at Bournemouth on Thursday which increased the pressure on the Australian.
